SA15n1257:2: atheha prakāśasahopalambhādisādhanabalena jaḍapadārtharāśāvapāste nīlapītādyaśeṣapadārthajāte ca svacittapratibhāsātmani svapnamāyādivadadvayarūpe siddhe santānāntarasadasattānirūpaṇārthamidamārabhyate |
SA15n1257:5: tathā hīcchācittasamanantaravyāhāravyavahārābhāsasya darśanāt tadabhāve cādarśanādupalambhānupalambhasādhanamanvayavyatirekaśarīramicchācittena saha vyāhārādyābhāsasya kāryakāraṇabhāvamātmasantāne'vadhāryecchācittasyāpratisaṃvedanasamaye'pi vicchinnavyāhārādyābhāsadarśanāt tatkāraṇabhūtamicchācittamanumīyamānaṃ santānāntarameva vyavatiṣṭhata iti |
SA15n1257:23: na cecchāmātrasya svaparasantānasādhāraṇasya svasaṃvedanenānyena vābhāvaḥ śakyāvagamaḥ |
SA15n1257:24: yathā hi vahnimātrasya deśakālavyavahitasyāpi dhūmotpādadeśakālayoryadi syādupalabhyetaiva mayeti saṃbhāvitasyānumātṛpuruṣendriyapratyakṣeṇadhūmotpādāt prāgabhāve'vadhāryamāṇastadutpattisiddhimadhyāsayatīti vyavahitadeśakālasyāpi vahnerdhūmamātraṃ prati kāraṇatvāvadhāraṇam,
SA15n1257:26: tathātrāpīcchācittaṃ parasantānasādhāraṇamapi yāvadyadīya syādupalabhyetaiva mayeti yadi saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyeta tadā tadvyatirekasiddhidvāreṇa kāraṇatayāvadhāryate |
SA15n1257:31: yasminneva hi śuklaśaṅkhādideśe svacittaṃ śuklākārapratibhāsi svasaṃvedanena vedyate taddeśavartyeva pītākārapratibhāsi parasantānabhāvi cittaṃ na vedyate |
SA15n1257:34: na hyagnirapyeko yenaivendriyavijñānena dṛśyate tenaivānyo'pi dṛśyam |
SA15n1257:35: tatra yathā cakṣurvijñānamātrāpekṣayā agnimātraṃ dṛśyamiti vyavasthāpyate tathātrāpi svasaṃvedanamātrāpekṣayā icchācittamātraṃ svaparasantānasādhāraṇamapi dṛśyameveti |
SA15n1257:36: atrocyate | kimatra mātraśabdenānumātṛpuruṣasaṃbandhāsaṃbandhābhyāmaviśeṣitaṃ yasya kasyacit puruṣasyendriyajñānaṃ vastuviṣayīkurvāṇamasya dṛśyatāsaṃbhave'pinānimitamabhimatam |
SA15n1257:38: so'pi hi kasyacit puṃso yogyādeḥ svajātīyasya vā piśācāntarasya bhavatyevendriyajñānagocara iti na kaścit svabhāvaviprakṛṣṭaḥ syāt |
SA15n1257:39: tasmādanumātṛpuruṣasaṃbandhitvamanapāsya vijñānasya svalakṣaṇādibhedanirāsapara eva mātraśabdo yuktaḥ |
SA15n1257:42: ityādi | tenaivaṃ dṛśyatāsaṃbhāvanā yadīha deśe kāle vā syād ghaṭādirniyamenopalabhyeta,
SA15n1257:45: yadīha paracittaṃ syāt niyamena madīyasya svasaṃveda(na)
SA15n1257:48: tadānumānakāle'pi dṛśyatayā saṃbhāvya tadanupalambhenābhāvasādhane kathamanumānaṃ pravartayitumidamārabdham,
SA15n1257:51: tasmādicchācittamātrasya svaparasantānasādhāraṇasya dṛśyatayā saṃbhāvayitumaśakyatvāt vyahārādyutpādāt prāganupalambhe'pyabhāvasiddhau na tadabhāvaprayukto vyāhārādyabhāvaḥ pratīyata iti kathaṃ kāraṇatvasiddhiryataḥ kāryahetudvāreṇānumīyeta |
SA15n1257:53: kiṃ tu tasya dṛśyānupalambhājjijñāsitaviśeṣe dharmiṇi bādhitasya kathamanumānamityuktameva ||
SA15n1257:55: icchācittamātre'pi svaparasantānasādhāraṇe sādhye yadyanupalambhamātreṇa dṛśya viśeṣaṇānapekṣeṇa pratibandhasiddhisamaye tasyābhāvaḥ pratīyate,
SA15n1257:56: tadā pakṣīkṛte dharmiṇi tatheti sa eva doṣaḥ |
SA15n1257:57: atha na pratīyate tadā sandigdhavyatireko hetvābhāso vyāhārādiriti sthitam |
SA15n1257:58: evaṃ tarhi santānāntarasādhakasyābhāvād bādhakasyāpi kasyacidadarśanādbhavatu tatra sandeha eveti kecit |
SA15n1257:60: yadi hi santānāntaraṃ saṃbhavet tadā tato bhedena svasantānasyāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam |
SA15n1257:61: anyathā svasantānādapi prakāśamānāttasya parasantānābhimatasya bhedo na syāt |
SA15n1257:62: na cābhedastayoriti svasantānād bhedābhedābhyāmabādhyasya parasantānasya sāmānyaśaśaviṣāṇādivadabhāva evāyāta iti kathaṃ sandehaḥ |
SA15n1257:64: sa ca bhedaḥ santānasya svabhāvaḥ svasantāne pratibhāsamāne niyamena pratibhāseta |
SA15n1257:67: bhedapratibhāse hi upagamyamāne tadavadhibhūtasyāpi parasantānasya pratibhāso durapahnavaḥ syāt |
SA15n1257:69: sāvadherasya bhāsaḥ syānna vā grāhyaṃ tadātmanā ||
SA15n1257:72: yathā hi svasantānamātre parisphurati śaśaviṣāṇādasphurato na bhedaḥ pratibhāti tathā parasantānādapi sphuraṇavirahiṇo na bhātyeva bhedaḥ |
SA15n1257:73: na hi parasantānāpekṣayā kaścid viśeṣaleśaḥ svasantānasya parisphurati yo nāsti śaśaviṣāṇāpekṣayā |
SA15n1257:74: na ca śaśaviṣāṇaparasantānāvapekṣya samāne svasantānapratibhāse śaśaviṣāṇāpekṣayā na bhedo nāpyabhedaḥ pratibhāti |
SA15n1257:75: parasantānāpekṣayā tu bheda eva bhātītyevamavasthāpayituṃ śakyam |
SA15n1257:76: bhedābhedayorabhāvaparihāreṇa hi yathā bhedo vyavasthitaḥ tadvad bhedapratibhāso'pi bhedābhedābhāvapratibhāsavilakṣaṇa evocito bhavitum,
SA15n1257:86: tataścātraiva sandeho na bahirartha iti cet |
SA15n1257:89: kadācidasau nāstyeva na cāsāvavabhāsata ityapi vaktuṃ śakteḥ |
SA15n1257:90: kiṃ ca mā nāma bhāsīṣṭa bahirarthaḥ kasyacidapi tathāpi kathaṃ tadabhāvasiddhirbhedapratibhāsābhyupagamavādina itīyanmātramiha vivakṣitam |
SA15n1257:92: tasmād bahirarthena sādhāraṇaṃ santānāntaramiti kathaṃ vijñaptivādināmapi saṃmataṃ bhaviṣyati |
SA15n1257:93: kiṃ ca kāryakāraṇabhāvo'pi vijñānadvayasya bhedapratibhāsavādinā bādhitumaśakyaḥ |
SA15n1257:94: pūrvabhāvinī hi saṃvittiḥ parasaṃvittyapekṣayā bhedaṃ pūrvatvaṃ cātmano gṛhṇātyevāvadhipratibhāsavigame'pi ||
SA15n1257:95: parabhāvinyapi saṃvittiḥ pūrvasaṃvittyapekṣayā bhedaṃ paratvaṃ cātmano'dhigacchatyeva santānāntaravaditi niyatapūrvāparabhāvalakṣaṇe kāryakāraṇabhāve'vabhāsamāne'vasīyamāne ca nīlādicitrākāravat katham
SA15n1257:97: iti bhagavato vārtikakārasya vacanena phalitamatra mate |
SA15n1257:98: api ca citrākāracakre dharmiṇyadvaitasādhanārthamupanyastasya prakāśamānatvādihetorbhedagrāhakapratyakṣāpahṛtaviṣayatvamudbhāvayataḥ prativādino bhedagrahaṇamanumanyamānena santānāntarasandehaṃ ca vinā kathamuttaritavyaṃ bhavatā ||
SA15n1257:107: yathā ca yadupalabhyamānaṃ yenaṃ rūpeṇa na bhāsate na tat tena rūpeṇa sadvyavahārayogyaṃ yathā nīlaṃ pītarūpeṇa |
SA15n1257:112: avadhyapratibhāse tu bhedapratibhāsābhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇabhedapratibhāsābhāvavat siddha eva |
SA15n1257:113: evamanena pramāṇena santānāntarasya svacittāpekṣayā bhede pratikṣipte abhede ca svayamevāsaṃbhavini bhedābhedābhyāmavācyatvaṃ siddham |
SA15n1257:118: api ca santānāntare tāvadarvāgdṛśāṃ sandeho bhavadbhiranumanyate |
SA15n1257:121: vidyamānameva kadācit santānāntaraṃ bhagavatā nāvadhāryate tathāpyasau sarvajña iti kathametat |
SA15n1257:124: pratyakṣeṇa paracittapratītau grāhyagrāhakabhāvo'pi paracittasya bhagavaccittena sahāyāta iti bahirarthavāda eva mukhāntareṇopagataḥ syāt,
SA15n1257:128: yāvacca bhedagrahaṇābhimānarūpā saṃvṛsttitāvat santānāntare sandehāttadavabodhanārthaṃ vacanādirapi pravartata iti svavacanavirodho'pi na saṃbhavatyeva |
SA15n1257:129: na khalu santānāntaraviṣayaḥ sarvathā sandeho nāstyevetyabhimatamasmākam,
SA15n1257:131: idaṃ hi santānāntarābhāvasādhanamadvayasādhanena sādhāraṇamiti naikaniyataḥ svavacanādivirodhastatparihāro vā |
SA15n1257:132: citrākārasaṃbhavamātreṇāpi ca vedāntadhvāntāpasāro bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitaḥ | tathā ca
SA15n1257:133: ātmā sa tasyānubhavaḥ sa ca nānyasya kasyacit
SA15n1257:136: na citrākārasaṃvedanāt ityādi dveṣavikaluṣāśeṣā eva tuṣākāro'pi vedāntasiddhānta iti alakṣita tadgranthānutthāpayantī santānāntarāpekṣayā paṭhitavatītyavasthā (?)
